title: Tire wear particles co-exposure with nickel inhibits mung bean yield by reducing nutrient uptake
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00070F, Paper
Imran Azeem, Muhammad Adeel, Shakoor Noman, Muhammad Zain, Hamida Bibi, Kamran Azeem, Yuanbo Li, Muhammad Nadeem, Umair Manan, Peng Zhang, Jason C. White, Yukui Rui
Soil and terrestrial contamination with microplastic and nanoplastic have been discussed extensively, while tire wear particles (TWPs) have been largely overlooked. We investigated the root-surface interactions and growth response of...
